charges.charge_description: 21:841 POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE HEROIN AND COCAINE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a total term of 156 months, consisting of 96 months as to count 1; and 60 months as to count 4 to run consecutive to Count 1. The defendant shall receive credit for time served since 2/2/2016; SUPERVISED RELEASE for a term of 5 years as to Counts 1 and 4, to run concurrently; ASSESSMENT $200

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(4)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT for a total term of 156 months, consisting of 96 months as to count 1; and 60 months as to count 4 to run consecutive to Count 1. The defendant shall receive credit for time served since 2/2/2016; SUPERVISED RELEASE for a term of 5 years as to Counts 1 and 4, to run concurrently; ASSESSMENT $200

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g) FELON IN POSSESSION OF FIREARM AND AMMUNITION; 18:924(e) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(2)
